metadata.title: CVE-2020-11078 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
In httplib2 before version 0.18.0, an attacker controlling unescaped part of uri for `httplib2.Http.request()` could change request headers and body, send additional hidden requests to same server. This vulnerability impacts software that uses httplib2 with uri constructed by string concatenation, as opposed to proper urllib building with escaping. This has been fixed in 0.18.0.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-11078` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-httplib2 - 0.18.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-httplib2 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.18.1-1').
